content: These Gourd Drinks are rare in the game, and there are only a few different options to be found, mostly through exploration. You can also find individual Gourds and Soaks that provide additional perks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drinks.md', within the main section titled 'Drinks'.
The content is as follows:
These Gourd Drinks are rare in the game, and there are only a few different options to be found, mostly through exploration. You can also find individual Gourds and Soaks that provide additional perks.
